question: A factory in Japan had been dumping mercury into Minamata Bay. Certain microorganisms in the water were able to change the mercury into a form that the plankton could use. Which most likely happened next?
candidate_answers: (A) The organisms built up a resistance to the mercury. (B) The mercury passed through the food chain. (C) The plankton made the mercury safe. (D) The fish would not eat the plankton.
answer: The organisms built up a resistance to the mercury.
label: A
